resources.string: Take a picture of the logo
Location data retrieval and social networking service for Android.
• To recognize the name of the place, press \'Start\' and point the crosshair towards the logo of the place, making sure to point the center towards the logo\'s font colour.
• Alternatively, you can bypass image recognition by manually inputting the name of the place in the textbox and pressing \'Find\'.
Enabling this will display the 3 intermediate text extraction steps that take place after the image was taken, but before OCR occurs. This is turned off by default for time efficiency.
